title: Freaky Friday: Episode 8
description:
Dying with dignity, the horrors that can happen behind closed doors, helping solve a cold case, a literal brush with true crime, friends, and figures from beyond the grave, and a spa treatment that was out of this world.

If you have a story you would like to submit for Freaky Friday, please do so here.
For information on our upcoming tour and to purchase tickets, please click here!
